title: CAN WE PLEASE HAVE A PBE IN OCE
body: We need PBE in oce and please remove bans from it because i have been baned 2 time because of server unstability plus how can we stand on equal footing with NA if we dont have the same resources as them (Dominion, PBE, Better internet server and Twisted tree line Team draft)

replies.body: the thing is OCE is one of the main servers in lol now in my opinion so i was wondering that they could make a beta testing server in oce (pbe),

um , its never a good idea to have undefined goals , or goals that are to broad, you lose to much support that way.
do we need more game modes ? yes.
do we need a pbe ? no. you dont understand what pbe is for if you are asking for a oce pbe.
the purpose of pbe is to test new content for bugs before it goes live.

there are many reasons as to why a PBE in oce is a moot point , if you would like to put some arguments forward i would be happy to explain each counter argument
